All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddItemCallback
A callback interface to handle the result of adding an item.
CameraActivity
This class is the camera activity of the app.
HomePageActivity
This class is the main activity of the app.
Item
This class represents an item in the inventory.
ItemAdapter
This class is the adapter for the recycler view.
ItemAddActivity
This class is the activity that allows the user to add a new item to the inventory.
ItemAddTagsFragment
This class represents a dialog fragment for adding tags to items in the inventory
ItemDB
This class manages the Firestore database for the items.
ItemFilterFragment
A fragment for filtering items within the context of the HomePageActivity.
ItemFilterFragment_TagFragment
A dialog fragment allowing the filtering by tags within an ItemFilterFragment context.
ItemSorterFragment
This class represents a dialog fragment for sorting items in the inventory
LoginActivity
This class is the login activity of the app.
SelectionViewModel
ViewModel for managing and providing data related to item selection, specifically number of items selected.
SignUpActivity
This class is the signup activity of the app.
TagAdapter
An adapter for managing tags in a RecyclerView.
UserProfileActivity
